items.sentence: If you are a welder, we have just the job for you.
You should protect your eyes from direct sunlight.
In case you have to leave, let us know beforehand.
Have you left the country in the last three years?
Tom never does anything without Mary's permission.
All you have to do is to pretend that you like it.
I don't think Tom has ever even been to Australia.
I liked Tom's first book more than the second one.
Mary has over thirty pairs of shoes in her closet.
Are you sure you want to give Tom that much money?
Are you sure you want to give all this stuff away?
Not many people can afford to buy a car like that.
I got to know Tom while I was living in Australia.
Tom probably isn't going to go to Boston tomorrow.
Tom probably isn't still interested in doing that.
Tom is probably not going to be at home on Monday.
Tom is probably not going to be impressed by that.
Tom is probably not going to volunteer to do that.
Tom was out of breath after running up the stairs.
You should get to the hospital as soon as you can.
